name: The Tale of ALLTYNEX - Japan's Epic Shooting Game Trilogy!
blurb: Developer SITER SKAIN's much-loved and highly respected indie shooting game series finally receives an English language release!

rewards.reward: ARMED SABOTEUR. Contribute $1 to receive all future project updates and have your name listed in the Roll of Honor at the ALLTYNEX homepage which will go live after the completion of the Kickstarter campaign (http://www.alltynex.com).

BRAIN FUSION RECIPIENT. Everything in the $5 ARMED SABOTEUR tier, plus: a digital copy of the original ALLTYNEX soundtrack of your choice, a set of ALLTYNEX wallpapers for use on your PC, iPhone and iPad.

BACKER (SOUNDTRACK). Everything in the $5 ARMED SABOTEUR tier, plus: digital copies of ALL 3 original soundtracks to the ALLTYNEX trilogy - over 4 hours of kick-ass tunes and extras, a \u2018Backer (Soundtrack)\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.

BACKER (GAME). Everything in the $5 BRAIN FUSION RECIPIENT tier, plus: a digital copy of the ALLTYNEX game of your choice, a \u2018Backer (Game)\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.
SUPPORTER. Everything in the $5 BRAIN FUSION RECIPIENT tier, plus: digital copies of two ALLTYNEX games of your choice, a \u2018Supporter\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.

DONOR. Everything in the $5 BRAIN FUSION RECIPIENT tier, plus: the full \u2018The Tale of ALLTYNEX\u2019 digital set of all 3 games, a \u2018Donor\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.

ADVOCATE. Everything in the $15 BACKER (SOUNDTRACK) tier, plus: the full \u2018The Tale of ALLTYNEX\u2019 digital set of all 3 games, an \u2018Advocate\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.

BENEFACTOR. Everything in the $45 ADVOCATE tier, plus: a Kickstarter exclusive KAMUI T-shirt, a \u2018Benefactor\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second. Shipping in the US is free. For all other destinations, please add $10.

GUARDIAN. Everything in the $100 BENEFACTOR tier, plus: a Kickstarter exclusive The Tale of ALLTYNEX T-shirt, a \u2018Guardian\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second. Shipping in the US is free. For all other destinations, please add $10.

PATRON. Everything in the GUARDIAN tier, plus: a Kickstarter exclusive \u2018Inu Ball\u2019 (SITER SKAIN mascot) plushie, measuring 30 cm in diameter, made of faux fur and with an embroidered face, a \u2018Patron\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second. Free shipping worldwide.

CHAMPION. Everything in the $500 PATRON tier, plus: a Kickstarter exclusive dakimakura featuring full color front and back illustrations of the heroine of KAMUI, Panaffil De Alice, created by the artist/designer Senami-san, and a \u2018Champion\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.\r\nNOTE: Includes pillow case and body. Images are completely SFW. Free shipping worldwide.

HERO. Everything in the CHAMPION tier, plus: You will join the privileged few to have their name listed in the ALLTYNEX War Record shown in the ending of ALLTYNEX Second, a \u2018Hero\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.

ANGEL. Everything in the HERO tier, plus: You will meet with Nyu Media and SITER SKAIN at the Winter Comiket event to be held in Tokyo in December 2013. Airfare and accommodation are included and Nyu Media will act as your guide and interpreters for the event, introducing you to SITER SKAIN and other stars of Japanese indie development. An \u2018Angel\u2019 contributor credit in the end roll of ALLTYNEX Second.
